actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to consent to the institution of an action in the United States District Court for the District of Rhode Island for the adjudication of the claim of Charles E. Day, Sr. and Mary Day, husband and wife against the United States.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the District Court for the District of Rhode Island for the adjudication of a claim of two named individuals against the United States.

titles.title: A bill to consent to the institution of an action in the United States District Court for the District of Rhode Island for the adjudication of the claim of Charles E. Day, Sr. and Mary Day, husband and wife against the United States.
